## OR Tax Volunteer Online Calculators and Tools
![](assets/tax_tools.png){.float-left width="100px"}

I develop and maintain tax calculation tools for [Oregon VITA volunteers](https://ortaxvolunteers.org), helping preparers navigate Oregon-specific deductions and credits. These tools support free tax preparation services for families earning under $67,000. **(Volunteer)**
